Hero.title: Talshir-IBC
Hero.description: Development, manufacturing and marketing of unique products in the construction industry.
Hero.highlight: All products hold unique patents and exclusive designs.

About.title: About Talshir
About.header: Talshir - Ilan Bar Ltd. was founded in 1994.
About.footer: Our products represent a breakthrough and innovation and are successfully marketed in the leading construction companies in Israel.
About.innovation: Initially, the company focused on constructing high-rise residential buildings and private homes in Israel. Over the years, with extensive hands-on experience in the operational and engineering fields, the company identified opportunities to advance and develop work processes. As part of its activities, the company began designing and developing unique and exclusive products aimed at improving construction processes, work quality, cost reduction, and providing a variety of solutions for the construction industry.

WhyUs.title: Why Choose Our Products
WhyUs.description: We provide cutting-edge solutions for leading construction companies and private developers in Israel.

card1.title: Unique Designs
card1.description: Innovative, high-quality, and eco-friendly materials, engineered for durability and efficiency in modern construction.

card2.title: Expert Guidance
card2.description: Our experienced engineers and designers work closely with clients, offering tailored solutions and expert advice at every stage.

card3.title: Reliable Delivery
card3.description: We ensure fast, secure, and transparent delivery with blockchain-backed tracking, keeping your projects on schedule.

card4.title: Global Standards
card4.description: Trusted by international construction leaders, our products meet the highest global quality and safety benchmarks.

card5.title: Customer Focus
card5.description: We prioritize client needs, offering personalized support, responsive service, and a commitment to long-term satisfaction.

card6.title: Strong Partnerships
card6.description: Collaborating with industry leaders, we develop solutions that integrate seamlessly with evolving construction demands.

Coops.title: Our Clients
Coops.description: Empowering top construction companies and private developers with advanced, innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, sustainability, and project success.

Products.title: Our Products
Products.description: We specialize in the design and development of unique and exclusive products designed to improve construction processes, work quality, reduce costs and provide a variety of solutions for the construction industry.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-quality distance keeper for concrete wall formwork.
modelUsage: Universal plastic accessory
Manufactured from ABS
Snap-fit assembly
Distance keeper suitable for casting walls, columns, and beams for rebar diameters ranging from 6 to 12 mm
Significant savings in time and labor required for rebar tying
Maintains standard spacing between rebar mesh and formwork
High compressive load resistance – see Standards Institution test – click here
Maximum precision in positioning rebar mesh and formwork, minimal interface with formwork
Three integrated annular water stops to prevent water ingress, corrosion, and cracking
Low self-weight, convenient for handling, transport, and storage
Recommended usage – 3-4 units/sqm

modelExtraContent.desc: When special, non-standard sizes are required, we provide cut pipes + end accessory. This allows for any size.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-quality Dividag pipe for Dividag bolt and distance keeping between opposing formwork.
modelUsage: High-quality protective pipe for 'Dividag' bolt and distance keeping between opposing formwork.
Withstands high working loads, the pipe has integrated annular water stops to prevent water ingress through the outer shell of the pipe.
After formwork removal, the two cones are easily detached at the cone's breaking point.
The pipe is constructed from high-quality, strong, and precise plastic, convenient for handling, transport, and storage.

modelExtraContent.header: High-Quality Dividag Pipe in Special Sizes
modelExtraContent.desc: Can be ordered in any size. Packed in bags of 100 units. 'Dividag' pipe end connection is done manually with a light press.

ProductsList.modelDescription: High-pressure water and gas seal for Dividag pipe in concrete walls.
modelUsage: High-pressure water and gas seal.
Significant savings in time and labor costs.
Quick and simple assembly.
The stopper is constructed from high-quality and durable materials for many years.
Manufactured in concrete color for a clean and aesthetic appearance.
ProductsList.pikodHaorefApproved: Approved by the Home Front Command for use in shelters and protected spaces.

modelExtraContent.header: The stopper was successfully tested according to Israeli Standard 1476 Part 2, during the test the stopper withstood a constant pressure of 5 atmospheres in water in a pressure chamber.
modelExtraContent.desc: The stopper was successfully tested at the Standards Institution of Israel and found suitable for the Home Front Command instructions as defined in the specification for sealing pipe passages in protected spaces. Meets the sealing instructions under internal and external helium gas pressure.
modelExtraContent.extraContent: Demonstration in a transparent pipe to illustrate the process in a 'Dividag' pipe.

ProductsList.modelNamePage: Nadal Rotem - Bottom Mesh Distance Keeper
ProductsList.modelDescription: Bottom mesh distance keeper for heavy rebar loads in massive ceilings.
modelUsage: Plastic accessory made of high-quality material designed to maintain distance between bottom mesh and formwork.
Withstands high weight load.
Stable, does not tend to bend.
1 unit per square meter of rebar mesh.
Savings in costs and labor time for arranging the bottom rebar.
Concrete cover: comes in two sizes - 2.5 cm, 3 cm

modelExtraContent.desc: 50 cm distance keeper for rebar mesh in concrete walls
modelExtraContent.extraContent: The clip - a plastic accessory that easily mounts on the Nadal and allows the Nadal to be hung on a vertical mesh. Option to use an additional clip for full attachment of the Nadal to the rebar mesh.

ProductsList.modelName: Dividag Pipe with Adjustable Distance Keeper
ProductsList.modelNamePage: Dividag Pipe with Adjustable Distance Keeper
ProductsList.modelDescription: Distance keeper mounted on the pipe with a 360-degree swivel mechanism.
modelUsage: High-quality protective pipe for 'Dividag' bolt and distance keeping between opposing formwork.
Significant savings in time and labor required for closing formwork for concrete casting.
Withstands high working loads.
The distance keeper is mounted on the pipe with a 360° swivel mechanism, the mechanism holds the pipe perpendicular to the formwork and facilitates the assembly of the formwork.
The cone is constructed with 2 sealing rings and 4 recesses designed for sealing and holding the 'grout' - grout using the Branovitch method.
The pipe has integrated annular water stops to prevent water ingress through the outer shell of the pipe.
Precise and high-quality plastic accessory, convenient for handling, transport, and storage.

modelExtraContent.header: The stopper was successfully tested according to Israeli Standard 1476 Part 2, during the test the stopper withstood a constant pressure of 5 atmospheres in water in a pressure chamber.
modelExtraContent.desc: The stopper was successfully tested at the Standards Institution of Israel and found suitable for the Home Front Command instructions as defined in the specification for sealing pipe passages in protected spaces. Meets the sealing instructions under internal and external helium gas pressure.

ProductsList.modelNamePage: Sharon Bench for Upper Mesh 18-30 cm
ProductsList.modelDescription: Bench for upper rebar in concrete floor with thickness (19-30cm).
modelUsage: Sharon bench is designed for ceilings with thickness 18-30cm
Bottom rebar clip is designed to easily and quickly clip to the bottom rebar and stabilize the bench. It also provides a straight line for assembling the support rebar for the mesh.
Savings in costs and labor time, 1 unit per square meter of upper mesh.
High load resistance - each bench withstands a load of 200kg (see test)
Suitable for a variety of precast concrete elements.
Prevents movement during concrete hardening.
ProductsList.modelCertification: Tested at the Israeli Plastics and Rubber Center

modelExtraContent.header: The stopper was successfully tested according to Israeli Standard 1476 Part 2, during the test the stopper withstood a constant pressure of 5 atmospheres in water in a pressure chamber.
modelExtraContent.desc: The stopper was successfully tested at the Standards Institution of Israel and found suitable for the Home Front Command instructions as defined in the specification for sealing pipe passages in protected spaces. Meets the sealing instructions under internal and external helium gas pressure.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Flexible and high-quality seal for Dividag pipe.
modelUsage: Water sealing with 4 flexible sealing rings.
The seal structure combined with a sealing adhesive creates a complete seal and strong adhesion between the seal and the pipe.
Quick and simple assembly, significant savings in time and labor costs.
FlexStop is manufactured from high-quality materials that are durable for many years.
Efficient and fast sealing in concrete walls and stone walls using the Branovitch method.

modelExtraContent.header: Installation Steps Using the Branovitch Method
modelExtraContent.desc: Meets water tightness test according to Israeli Standard 4422

ProductsList.modelDescription: Bottom mesh distance keeper for heavy loads.
modelUsage: Quick and easy to assemble – plastic accessory that easily and quickly attaches to the mesh.
Savings in costs and labor time – 1 unit per sqm of mesh, quick arrangement of bottom rebar on the formwork.
Withstands a weight load of 954kg.
Very stable and does not tend to bend.
Concrete cover – comes in two sizes 25mm and 30mm.

modelExtraContent.header: Installation Steps Using the Branovitch Method
modelExtraContent.extraContent: Rotem + is designed for massive concrete ceilings where the rebar weight is particularly high. The Rotem unit withstands a high load according to the test conducted at the Israeli Plastics Center.

ProductsList.modelDescription: 8cm diameter round distance keeper suitable for all building elements – walls, columns, beams, and ceilings.
modelUsage: Quick and easy to assemble – plastic accessory that easily and quickly attaches to the rebar.
Savings in costs and labor time – suitable for all building elements, one type provides a solution for all elements.
Concrete cover thickness – comes in two sizes - 2.5cm, 3cm

modelExtraContent.header: Installation Steps Using the Branovitch Method
modelExtraContent.extraContent: Rotem + is designed for massive concrete ceilings where the rebar weight is particularly high. The Rotem unit withstands a high load according to the test conducted at the Israeli Plastics Center.

modelUsage: End accessory for pipe passage in exterior walls.
Lightweight plastic design.
Easy to install and remove.

modelExtraContent.header: High-Quality Dividag Pipe in Special Sizes
modelExtraContent.desc: Can be ordered in any size. Packed in bags of 100 units. 'Dividag' pipe end connection is done manually with a light press.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Protection sleeve for porcelain granite in wall cladding.
modelUsage: Eco Wall.
Suitable for a variety of construction applications.
High pressure resistance.
End accessory for pipe passage in exterior walls.
Lightweight plastic design.
Easy to install and remove.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Maintains distance between the rebar cage of the pile and contact with the ground during pile casting.
modelUsage: Sliding wheel for piles with a diameter of 110 mm.
Easy to assemble.
3 units per linear meter.

modelExtraContent.extraContent: Rotem + is designed for massive concrete ceilings where the rebar weight is particularly high. The Rotem unit withstands a high load according to the test conducted at the Israeli Plastics Center.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Adjustable plastic clip that is easily and quickly assembled for plaster corners.
modelUsage: Significant savings in time and labor costs required for assembling plaster corners in a building.
Maximum precision in assembling plaster corners with simultaneous adjustment in two planes.
Convenient for work, simple assembly with a hammer drill, marking paint, hammer, and level.
Recommended to use 3 units per 3-meter plaster corner.

modelExtraContent.extraContent: Rotem + is designed for massive concrete ceilings where the rebar weight is particularly high. The Rotem unit withstands a high load according to the test conducted at the Israeli Plastics Center.

modelUsage: Easy and quick assembly and adjustment of the Mikes with maximum precision.
Significant savings in time and labor costs required for assembling Mikes.
Recommended to use 2-3 units per 3-meter long Mike.

modelExtraContent.desc: Can be ordered in any size. Packed in bags of 100 units. 'Dividag' pipe end connection is done manually with a light press.

ProductsList.modelDescription: Adjustable plastic clip that is easily and quickly assembled for plaster corners.
modelUsage: Significant savings in time and labor costs required for assembling plaster corners in a building.
Maximum precision in assembling plaster corners with simultaneous adjustment in two planes.
Convenient for work, simple assembly with a hammer drill, marking paint, hammer, and level.
Recommended to use 3 units per 3-meter plaster corner.

modelExtraContent.extraContent: Rotem + is designed for massive concrete ceilings where the rebar weight is particularly high. The Rotem unit withstands a high load according to the test conducted at the Israeli Plastics Center.

left.content: Based in **Hod HaSharon, Israel**, Talshir-IBC partners with clients across the globe to bring patented construction technologies to life. With a focus on **eco-friendly innovations** and **cost-effective solutions**, we deliver tailored services to meet the demands of modern architecture

right.content: Talshir-IBC specializes in **unique construction patent solutions**, delivering innovative designs with **worldwide protection**. Our patents cover revolutionary technologies in **sustainable architecture** and **energy-efficient structures**, setting new standards in the industry
